sources.title: The Three Weird Sisters
sources.description: Title: The Three Weird Sisters Summary: A secretary suspects that her employer's three elderly sisters are plotting to kill him after he announces he'll no longer finance their philanthropic endeavors. Directed by: Daniel Birt Actors: Nancy Price, Mary Clare, Mary Merrall Production Company: British National Films Release Date: 12 July 1948 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A secretary suspects that her employer's three elderly sisters are plotting to kill him after he announces he'll no longer finance their philanthropic endeavors.

metadata.Plot: A secretary suspects that her employer's three elderly sisters are plotting to kill him after he announces he'll no longer finance their philanthropic endeavors.
metadata.Writer: Charlotte Armstrong, Louise Birt, David Evans
metadata.Actors: Nancy Price, Mary Clare, Mary Merrall
